seed_pair.target: Lo habría hecho diferentemente si hubiera sabido lo que querías.
seed_pair.known: I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.

S0142: Eso es muy amable de tu parte y estoy agradecido a ti por ayudar.
That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.
S0143: Es la misma cosa de la que estábamos hablando antes.
It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.
S0144: Me desperté más temprano de lo que quería esta mañana.
I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
S0145: Why are you not happy any more?
S0146: Nada parece estar funcionando desde que intentamos arreglarlo.
Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.
S0147: Ella era muy amable cuando me vio sintiéndome nervioso.
She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
S0148: Él no era muy paciente cuando no pude responder.
He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.
S0149: Esto no es muy difícil, entonces espero que termines pronto.
This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
S0150: Can you tell me what your name is?
S0151: Eso no era lo que estaba esperando que pasara.
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
